授業目的: Students learn and analyze specific areas in marketing from both practical and theoretical viewpoints. Especially, the course emphasizes “the Japanese way of Marketing.” The topics include various industries and the global and digital marketing perspectives. Students understand and analyze unique aspects of the Japanese marketing method and its place in global and digital trends.
到達目標: The learning goals include theoretical and analytical frameworks to clarify complex marketing phenomena, especially in Japan.
授業方法:
Scheduled to be held in a simultaneous interactive online class.
Case Method, Group Discussion, Lecture, and Student Presentation
